resources.string: PRESS the mic below and speak after the beep sound
The easiest way to open any app on your device!..say the app name after the word OPEN
Dial any number directly just by your voice
Search on the net without having to type the thing out
Get the current time and the weather forcast on your command
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
1. Open any APP - To open any app installed on your device just say the name of the app followed by the keyword open
Feel free to contact us regrarding any queries or problems regarding the APP.Your suggestions are greatly appreciated.
2. Directly dial any phone number just say the DIAL followed by the mobile number.
Click here to check the list of apps installed on your device
E.g- say dial 99xx-xxxx-xx and it will place the call immediately
3. Search directly on the web just by saying what you want to search.
E.g- search upcoming smartphones under 10000 rs
4. Get the current time and date just by asking the app.
E.g- what is the time of what date is today
